content: This is not saying that tokens are equity. It’s saying that if the project issues tokens, then the holder of the SAFTE gets tokens, if the project instead sells Equity, then the holder of the SAFTE receives Equity. However, its important to note that in SEC concerns, it is not the selling of equity which is problematic, it’s ‘general solicitation’ that can land you in hot water. In other words, if you advertise for investors, and use this document, you’re still going to fall foul of US securities regs.
